title: (x) BPD Investigations Unit - (similar to) Windsor {Conor}
content:
I’ve now sorted again through all my fonts and am unable to find this one.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080724235432im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/bpd_5922.jpg)

Any ideas of what font it might be?  
My two closest matches are Souvenir and Cooper

 [‹ Villanova logo condensed flare serif](http://web.archive.org/web/20080724235432/http:/www.typophile.com/node/30162 "Go to previous forum topic") [Donald Barthelme "Forty Stories" book cover ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080724235432/http:/www.typophile.com/node/30150 "Go to next forum topic")
author: retoid

comments.content: Kinda looks like Windsor Condensed… I’ll have a check.

thats it, looks thinned down a hair.

Thanks
Don’t know why you thought it would be easy though?

It looks like cut out lettering.

It fits very well the version of Windsor that ships with [SignLab](http://web.archive.org/web/20080724235432/http:/www.cadlink.com/products/signLab/), mechanically squooshed™

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080724235432im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/bpd%20ai_4233.gif)
I first thought this was [Hellboy](http://web.archive.org/web/20080724235432/http:/www.hellboy.com/) merchandising, but there’s an R missing. :^)

Richard: It is cut vinyl. I have to recreate it.  
Unfortunately I don’t have that font. I wonder if I can get the Windsor version somewhere other than purchasing signlab.

I guess I thought it’d be an easy one cause the font looks familiar to me but it isn’t. :D
